name: Lsof
title: This quick reference cheat sheet provides various for using lsof command.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This quick reference cheat sheet provides various for using lsof command.

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body:
**lsof** meaning `L`i`S`t `O`pen `F`iles is used to find out which files are open by which process

```shell script
$ lsof
$ sudo lsof -u root
```

cards.title: Port-specific
cards.body:
```shell script
$ lsof -i :8080
$ lsof -i :80 -i :22
$ lsof -i TCP:22
$ lsof -i TCP:1-1024
$ lsof -i UDP
$ lsof -i @192.168.1.5
```

cards.title: Process-specific
cards.body:
```shell script
$ lsof -c mysql
$ lsof -c java
$ lsof -c ssh
$ lsof -c nginx
$ lsof -c ssh -c httpd
```

cards.title: User-specific
cards.body:
```shell script
$ lsof -u www-data
$ lsof -u www-data -u ubuntu
$ lsof -i -u ^root # Except certain user
```

cards.title: Network-specific
cards.body:
```shell script
$ lsof -i 4   # IPv4 only
$ lsof -i 6   # IPv6 only
```

cards.title: PID-specific
cards.body:
```shell script
$ lsof -p 1753
$ lsof -p ^3  # Except certain pids
```
